AVSEC Circular No. 08 /2010                                                                       
 
Subject : Operations / Mock exercise by NSG 
 
 
In order to streamline the operations by NSG without loss of time, the following actions 
shall be taken by all concerned : 
 
       i)     Gate opposite Sudarshan Complex of NSG at IGI airport shall be constructed by 31st 
March 2010 by DIAL/GMR taking into account all measures from civil aviation security point of 
view. The said gate will be manned by CISF/ASG and will be utilized by NSG for mobilization 
of its CHTF/CTTF troops only during emergency/mock exercise.  
 
      ii)    CISF shall allow, in the event of such exercise/operations, swift and hassle free entry 
of the NSG team into the airports through special gate, so as to save precious time for operations.   
 
      iii)  The NSG Task Force may enter and exit Delhi and any other airports in India 
through the vehicle gates along with their vehicles, stores, Arms/Ammunitions to board the 
Special Aircraft. Necessary permit for carriage of Dangerous Goods shall be obtained from 
DGCA by NSG. 
 
     iv)   The designated Nodal Officer of NSG shall inform and coordinate in advance with 
the CASO/ In-charge APSU of airport concerned for necessary action. 
 
     This issues with the approval of Commissioner of Security (CA) 
 
 
 
 
(M. Malaviya, IPS) 
Addl. Commissioner of Security (CA)
